body:
Ok, so it turns out that in the avicus spawn there are 3 different levers all around that unlock this door (http://i.imgur.com/BFSuarZ.png?1)
And when you go in there is this long hallway and then there is one room on the left side with this in it (http://i.imgur.com/jkhgMpx.jpg?1)
and if you go to the end of the hall, you find the cow god (http://i.imgur.com/v89N6y7.jpg?1) It also turns out, that you can go inside the cows eyeballs ._. (http://imgur.com/NS3eSUs) Now it's just up to you guys to find the levers, and the door!
body_tagged:

replies.body: I have been searching everywhere and I can only find 2 levers ;( the ones next to the stairs. Do you know where the 3rd lever is?
replies.body_tagged: I have been searching everywhere and I can only find 2 levers ;( the ones next to the stairs. Do you know where the 3rd lever is?

replies.body: The third lever is in the little area next to the two levers. Go down into the water and to the right there should be a lever.
